articles.title: ASEAN Leaders Endorse Digital Cooperation Pact
articles.summary: Member states commit to cross-border digital trade facilitation, cybersecurity collaboration, and AI ethics alignment.
content: The ASEAN Summit 2025 concluded its Digital Cooperation roundtable with a joint endorsement of a regional framework.
The pact outlines common data exchange formats, mutual recognition of trust services, and a roadmap for AI governance.

articles.title: Green Transition Fund Announced
articles.summary: A multi-billion USD initiative to accelerate renewable projects and grid modernization across ASEAN.
content: The fund prioritizes solar, wind, and storage pilots, with incentives for public-private partnerships.
Early beneficiaries include rural electrification efforts and cross-border power interconnectors.

articles.title: Skills Mobility Program Pilots in 3 Countries
articles.summary: New talent visa pathways will simplify short-term tech assignments and curriculum alignment.
content: The pilot will test credential portability and competency mapping across higher-ed institutions.
Lessons learned will inform wider roll-out by 2026.

articles.title: ASEAN Fintech Sandbox to Launch in Early 2026
articles.summary: A unified sandbox will allow startups to test cross-border financial innovations under harmonized regulatory oversight.
content: The initiative aims to streamline digital payment trials, enhance consumer protection, and boost financial inclusion.
Participating regulators will share data on compliance performance to shape regional fintech policies.

articles.title: Regional Food Security Task Force Formed
articles.summary: ASEAN ministers establish a task force to coordinate supply chain resilience and climate-smart agriculture.
content: The task force will monitor crop yields, water use efficiency, and logistics flows to anticipate disruptions.
A joint platform for data sharing and early warning systems will be operational by mid-2026.
